snippet: Mrs. Clinton called for speeding up the American-led operations against the Islamic State including a no-fly zone and more airstrikes.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton calls for no-fly zone with coalition forces to protect Syrians; suggests additional airstrikes and more special operations troops to defeat Islamic State; is careful to not directly criticize Pres Obama, but Clinton's plan has scope and urgency far beyond that emerging from White House.

byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and DAVID E. SANGER

lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton called for speeding up the American-led operations against the Islamic State including a no-fly zone and more airstrikes.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Goes Beyond President Obama in Plan to Defeat ISIS
headline.print_headline: Clinton’s Plan to Defeat ISIS Adds Urgency

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
